job_tasks.phrase: You will drive the migration/handover of the platform from a third party development company.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes a core software engineering task related to managing and transitioning a software platform, which falls under development and integration.

job_tasks.phrase: You will be responsible for maintaining and further developing the previously mentioned model delivery platform.
job_tasks.justification: Maintaining and developing a platform are fundamental software engineering activities, fitting the definition of Software Development & Integration.

job_tasks.phrase: You will help grow and shape the platform team based on real time business needs and client feedback.
job_tasks.justification: While this involves team growth, the context of shaping a platform team based on business needs points to the strategic development and integration of software capabilities.

job_tasks.phrase: You will work closely with the machine learning team to add new machine learning driven features to the platform.
job_tasks.justification: This task involves integrating ML-driven features into an existing platform, which is a key aspect of Software Development & Integration.

soft_skills.phrase: You will work closely with the machine learning team
soft_skills.justification: Working closely with another team implies collaboration and communication.

soft_skills.phrase: based on real time business needs and client feedback
soft_skills.justification: This indicates an understanding of business needs and client feedback to guide development, aligning with Business Understanding & Strategy.

profile.rationale: The job description focuses heavily on software development, platform maintenance, migration, and the integration of ML-driven features. While it mentions working with an ML team and adding ML features, the core responsibilities are centered around the platform's development and integration (Macro-Category A). There are no explicit tasks related to model development, fine-tuning, prompt engineering, or data engineering for AI models (Macro-Category B). Therefore, the role is classified as an AI-Adjacent Software Engineer.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad clearly outlines software development and integration tasks, and the interaction with ML features. However, it lacks specific details about the ML technologies or the depth of AI involvement beyond 'adding features'. This leaves some room for interpretation, hence a score of 4.
